schemes.name: Ayushman Bharat
schemes.description: Provides ₹5 lakh coverage for secondary and tertiary care.

schemes.name: PM-JAY
schemes.description: Free treatment at public/private empanelled hospitals.

schemes.name: Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana
schemes.description: Coverage of up to ₹30,000 for BPL families.
